name: Trash Madness (#TeamSeas)
description:
Trash Madness This Game Was Created For The TeamSeas Game Jam, hosted by PolyMars.

I unfortunately joined this jam late and only had five days to complete this game. This is my first game and it is still in development. Please make sure you play it in fullscreen to ensure you get the full experience. I'm sorry if its not the best, I just wanted to submit a least something. Hope you enjoy. The links for the jam and to donate to TeamSeas is below. 

TeamSeas Game Jam.

Donate to TeamSeas!
